response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe has immense value and could significantly benefit your business. Before we proceed, I'd like to extend an exclusive offer tailored for you. Considering the unique features and benefits this product offers, I am proposing a special introductory price of $10,500. This is a limited-time offer, designed to recognize your early interest and commitment to innovation in your field. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions about how this product can specifically enhance your operations.", "product_price": 10500}
